title: T205 Ty Cobb SGC 40 American Beauty Back
author: bigfish

posts.post_title: T205 Ty Cobb SGC 40 American Beauty Back

posts.post_content:
Never received a scan.  I wonder if you had just posted a scan in your offering  if I might have been the first to say I would take it.  I guess I'll never know.  

I went against my personal policy of not bothering with posting that don't have scans.  I guess I will return to that policy.
JimB

Never received a scan.  I wonder if you had just posted a scan in your offering  if I might have been the first to say I would take it.  I guess I'll never know.  


I went against my personal policy of not bothering with posting that don't have scans.  I guess I will return to that policy.
JimB

Jim,

sorry you did not get the card.  There were two people ahead of you and one took the card blind.  I go in order of e-mails received and you would have received a scan if the first two folks passed.  I understand your point about posting scans and will do that soon.  I also get scans out fast but do go in the order of requests.  Anyone can return a card that they have bought from me without an issue.  I have not had a single issue on this site and have done quite a few transactions.  Good luck in your pursuits.
